description: Make a mouth-watering pork shoulder roast for a stand-out family dinner. The roasted apples and maple gravy take this pork roast recipe to the next level.
keywords: Roast Pork Shoulder With Roasted Apples & Maple Gravy
name: Roast Pork Shoulder With Roasted Apples & Maple Gravy Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 kg Woolworths boneless roast pork shoulder
